scripts.make: yarn run reset && yarn run build
scripts.build: yarn run backend:build && yarn run package:build
scripts.preinstall: yarn global add rimraf eas-cli && yarn global upgrade --latest
scripts.clean: yarn run package:clean && yarn run backend:clean && yarn run client:clean
scripts.update: yarn run package:update && yarn run backend:update && yarn run client:update
scripts.install: yarn run package:install && yarn run backend:install && yarn run client:install
scripts.reset: yarn run package:clean && yarn run backend:clean && yarn run client:clean && yarn run package:install && yarn run backend:install && yarn run client:install
scripts.client:clean: cd client && rimraf android node_modules builds
scripts.client:update: cd client && yarn upgrade --latest --silent --force && yarn expo install --check
scripts.client:build:production: cd client && npx expo prebuild --platform android && export NODE_ENV='production' && export ANDROID_HOME='/opt/android-sdk' && export ANDROID_SDK_ROOT='/opt/android-sdk' && export JAVA_HOME='/usr/lib/jvm/jdk-23.0.2-oracle-x64' && export ANDROID_NDK_HOME='/opt/android-sdk/ndk/28.0.13004108' && export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$ANDROID_HOME/cmdline-tools/tools/bin:$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools:$ANDROID_HOME/build-tools/35.0.1:$ANDROID_NDK_HOME:$PATH && cd android && ./gradlew :app:bundleRelease --build-cache --configure-on-demand --no-daemon --max-workers=6 && mkdir -p ../builds && find ./app -name 'app-release.aab' -exec mv {} ../builds/yt-dlx-1.0.0-production.aab \;
scripts.client:build:distribution: cd client && npx expo prebuild --platform android && export NODE_ENV='production' && export ANDROID_HOME='/opt/android-sdk' && export ANDROID_SDK_ROOT='/opt/android-sdk' && export JAVA_HOME='/usr/lib/jvm/jdk-23.0.2-oracle-x64' && export ANDROID_NDK_HOME='/opt/android-sdk/ndk/28.0.13004108' && export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$ANDROID_HOME/cmdline-tools/tools/bin:$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools:$ANDROID_HOME/build-tools/35.0.1:$ANDROID_NDK_HOME:$PATH && cd android && ./gradlew :app:assembleRelease --build-cache --configure-on-demand --no-daemon --max-workers=6 && mkdir -p ../builds && find ./app -name 'app-release.apk' -exec mv {} ../builds/yt-dlx-1.0.0-distribution.apk \;
scripts.client:build:development: cd client && npx expo prebuild --platform android && export NODE_ENV='development' && export ANDROID_HOME='/opt/android-sdk' && export ANDROID_SDK_ROOT='/opt/android-sdk' && export JAVA_HOME='/usr/lib/jvm/jdk-23.0.2-oracle-x64' && export ANDROID_NDK_HOME='/opt/android-sdk/ndk/28.0.13004108' && export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$ANDROID_HOME/cmdline-tools/tools/bin:$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools:$ANDROID_HOME/build-tools/35.0.1:$ANDROID_NDK_HOME:$PATH && cd android && ./gradlew :app:assembleDebug --build-cache --configure-on-demand --no-daemon --max-workers=6 && mkdir -p ../builds && find ./app -name 'app-debug.apk' -exec mv {} ../builds/yt-dlx-1.0.0-development.apk \;
